title: Inès Durand Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Inès Durand? Check out all of Inès Durand's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogInès Durand Inès Durand Inès is a Senior Market Insights Manager at Similarweb specializing in Retail, CPG & Financial Services. She uses industry analysis to distribute cutting-edge and actionable market research insights through Similarweb's marketing, PR, and GTM teams. Her previous experience includes Strategy and M&A analysis at Worldline, and her work has been featured in Retail Today, CNBC & AFP.
